channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: West Heath Road near the top going uphill towards pond., 15th January
item.description:
This is the biggest pothole i have ever seen, my car literally fell sideways, in fact it is not a pothole it is more of a sinkhole, caused damage to my car, please fix immediately!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Heath Road, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 15 inch pothole Maidstone Road B2173, 15th January
item.description:
This pothole has been here for 3 months now and is getting worse by the day this is almost a 8 inches deep and causing every driver to swerve which is going to cause a serious accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maidstone Road, Greater London

item.title: The slip road needs sweeping, 15th January
item.description:
The slip road needs sweeping, there is lots of empty plastic bottles, can and other rubbish on the slip road. Please can council arrange to clear both side of slip road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A large pot hole, a drain surround collapse and and blocked drain, 15th January
item.description:
Located on Elmstead Lane, heading north towards Mottingham/Coldharbour direction between Offenham Road and Walden Avenue, next to the green on the left hand bend there are 2 road gully drains, between them is a very large pot hole which often you have no choice but to go down, due to the road being slightly narrow and oncoming traffic, its often filled with water as the gully doesn't drain, so don't always realise its under there. Also one of the drain gully surrounds has crumbled away also causing a big thud when driven over. Both have got much worse following the recent cold weather and now also having a large puddle on top. These could easily cause a puncture if it gets any worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Lane, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime E-Bikes Parked Dangerously, 15th January

item.title: Road drain blocked again when raining, 15th January
item.description:
I have reported the same problem previously ( ref 8564326) (Asset ID 730026098). Every time it rains , light or heavy rain the water is not draining away and pooling over the drain covers, causing large road flooding.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crescent Drive, Petts Wood, Greater London

item.title: Christmas trees left on pavement, 15th January
item.description:
There are two Christmas trees which have been left on the pavement outside 120 Albion Drive and 126 Albion Drive for over 2 weeks. I can only assume that the residents in the 2 properties do not have a garden waste subscription.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Albion Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
